name: ZodBod
overview:
Zodbod offers a platform for individuals who’ve achieved a successful physical transformation to sell or share the diet and exercise plans.

People who want to achieve a physical change can search for a mentor who has already achieved the exact change they want for themselves. Itâ€™s possible to search by weight, age, gender and many other factors.

Eventually every method of weight loss and every type of body change will be catered for. ZodBod offers a specifically tailored solution which has un-biased feedback for every situation. This is a massive step forward in clarity of information and will help millions of people worldwide.

We’re the worlds only long tail, web 2.0 approach to diet and exercise. Our system rewards people who help others get healthy and in shape. We’re a small new business but we’re aiming to be a very disruptive presence worldwide in the diet and fitness markets.
